episode_summary: In this episode, foundation repair expert Bob Brown discusses the importance of hiring licensed engineers for property inspections to prevent costly foundation repairs and potential litigation. He shares actionable tips for REALTORS to identify signs of foundation movement, emphasizing the role of soil types and the risks of relying on foundation repair companies for inspections. Bob's insights aim to help REALTORS enhance their service offerings and protect their clients.
